source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "You should know about joy!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多。
translation: With the method of nescience being nondual, nonproduction being nonproductivity, and nonacquisition, they will cultivate generosity, pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and the perfection of wisdom by dedicating themselves to the knowledge of all things; and with the method of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, grief over old age and death, pain, sorrow, and vexation being nondual, nonproductivity, and nonacquisition, they will cultivate generosity, pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and the perfection of wisdom by dedicating themselves to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住內空、外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住內空乃至無性自性空。
translation: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住內空、外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住內空乃至無性自性空。

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住真如、法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住真如乃至不思議界。
translation: Using the method of nescience being nondual, the method of nonproduction, and the method of nonacquisition, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and abides in true reality, the Dharma realm, the Dharma nature, non-falsity, unchanging diversity, equality, freedom from birth, legality, Dharma abiding, reality, the space realm, and the inconceivable realm; using the method of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, love, apprehension, existence, birth, grief at old age and death, the method of nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and abides in true reality up to the inconceivable realm.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "You should know this joy!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住苦、集、滅、道聖諦；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住苦、集、滅、道聖諦。
translation: By making nescience nondual, nonproduction nonconduct, and nonacquisition nonconduct, they will turn to omniscience and abide in the noble truths of suffering, arising, cessation, and the path; by making form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, and grief over old age and death nondual, nonproduction nonconduct, and nonacquisition nonconduct, they will turn to omniscience and abide in the noble truths of suffering, arising, cessation, and the path.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習四靜慮、四無量、四無色定；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習四靜慮、四無量、四無色定。
translation: He cultivates the four meditations, the four immeasurable concentrations, and the four formless concentrations with the method of nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition of nescience, and he cultivates the four meditations, four immeasurable concentrations, and the four formless concentrations with the method of nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition of form, contact, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, and grief of old age and death with the method of the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習八解脫、八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習八解脫、八勝處、九次第定、十遍處。
translation: With the method of nonduality of nescience, the method of nonproduction, and the method of nonacquisition, they will return to omniscience and cultivate the eight liberations, eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes; and with the method of nonduality of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, apprehension, existence, birth, grief of old age and death, the method of nonproduction, and the method of nonacquisition, they will return to omniscience and cultivate the eight liberations, eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習四念住、四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習四念住、四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支。
translation: Using the method of nonduality of nescience, the method of nonproduction, and the method of no-gain, they will dedicate themselves to the cognition of all things and cultivate the four abodes of mindfulness, the four correct eliminations, the four miraculous powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and the eight noble factors of the path; using the method of nonduality of form, name, form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, love, apprehension, existence, birth, old age, death, grief, pain, sorrow, and vexation as their method, they will dedicate themselves to the cognition of all things and cultivate the four abodes of mindfulness, the four correct eliminations, the four miraculous powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and the eight noble factors of the path.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "You should know this joy!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習空解脫門、無相解脫門、無願解脫門；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習空解脫門、無相解脫門、無願解脫門。
translation: With the method of nescience being nondual, nonproduction being the method, and nonacquisition being the method, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and cultivates the liberation of emptiness, the liberation of signlessness, and the liberation of wishlessness; with the method of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, love, apprehension, existence, birth, grief of old age, pain, and sorrow being nondual, nonproduction being the method, and nonacquisition being the method, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and cultivates the liberation of emptiness, the liberation of signlessness, and the liberation of wishlessness.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習五眼、六神通；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習五眼、六神通。
translation: He cultivates the five eyes and six supernormal powers by focusing on the fact that nescience is the method of nonduality, the method of nonproduction, and the method of nonacquisition, and he cultivates the five eyes and six supernormal powers by focusing on the fact that form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, lamentation of old age, suffering, and grief are the methods of converting to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習佛十力、四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習佛十力、四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法。
translation: With the convenience of nescience being nondual, nonproduction being nonproductivity, and nonacquisition, they will dedicate themselves to the cognition of all things and cultivate the Buddha's ten powers, four fearlessnesses, four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and 18 Buddha-uncommon dharmas; with the convenience of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, grief of old age, pain, and sorrow being nondual, nonproductivity, and nonacquisition, they will dedicate themselves to the cognition of all things and cultivate the Buddha's ten powers, four fearlessnesses, four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and 18 Buddha-uncommon dharmas.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "You should know this joy!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習無忘失法、恒住捨性；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習無忘失法、恒住捨性。
translation: Using the method of nescience being nondual, nonproduction being nonproductivity, and nonacquisition being nonproductivity, he dedicates himself to the knowledge of all things and cultivates the principle of nonforgetfulness and the constant abiding in equanimity; using the method of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, old age, death, grief, pain, and sorrow being nondual, nonproductivity, and nonacquisition being nonproductivity, he dedicates himself to the knowledge of all things and cultivates the principle of nonforgetfulness and the constant abiding in equanimity.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習一切智、道相智、一切相智；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習一切智、道相智、一切相智。
translation: Using the convenience of nescience being nondual, nonproduction being nonproductivity, and nonacquisition being nonproductivity, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and cultivates the cognition of all things, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all characteristics; using the convenience of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, love, appropriation, existence, birth, old age, death, grief, pain, and sorrow being nondual, nonproductivity, and nonacquisition being nonproductivity, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and cultivates the cognition of all things, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all characteristics.

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習一切陀羅尼門、一切三摩地門；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習一切陀羅尼門、一切三摩地門。
translation: Using the method of nescience being nondual, the method of nonproduction, and the method of nonacquisition, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and cultivates the dhāraṇī aspect and the approach to all samādhis; using the method of form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, old age, death, sorrow, suffering, and grief being nondual, nonproduction, and nonacquisition, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and cultivates the dhāraṇī aspect and the approach to all samādhis.

source_sentence: 以無明無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習菩薩摩訶薩行；以行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死愁歎苦憂惱無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習菩薩摩訶薩行。
translation: They cultivate the practice of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva by focusing on the fact that nescience is nondual, unborn, and unobtained, and they cultivate the practice of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva by focusing on the fact that form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, lamentation of old age, pain, and sorrow are nondual, unborn, and unobtained.

translation: He cultivates unsurpassed correct enlightenment by focusing on the fact that nescience is the method of nonduality, the method of nonproduction, and the method of nonacquisition, and he cultivates unsurpassed correct enlightenment by focusing on the fact that form, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense-fields, touch, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, lamentation of old age, suffering, and grief are the methods of converting to the knowledge of all things.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以布施波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住內空、外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；以淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住內空乃至無性自性空。
translation: With the method of the perfection of generosity, which is nondual, nonproductive, and unobtainable, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and abides in internal emptiness, external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, ultimate emptiness, infinite emptiness, dispersed emptiness, changeless emptiness, emptiness of original nature, emptiness of own-identity, emptiness of shared characteristics, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, emptiness of nature, self-nature, and emptiness of self-nature; with the method of the perfection of pure precepts, patience, effort, meditation, and prajñā, which is nondual, nonproductive, and unobtainable, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and abides in internal emptiness and even emptiness of self-nature.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以布施波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住真如、法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；以淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住真如乃至不思議界。
translation: With the method of the nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition of the perfection of generosity, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and abides in the true nature, the Dharma realm, the Dharma nature, non-falsity, unchanging diversity, equality, freedom from birth, legality, Dharma abiding, reality, the space realm, and the inconceivable realm; with the method of the nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition of the perfection of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom, he dedicates himself to the cognition of all things and abides in the true nature and even the inconceivable realm.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "You should know this joy!

source_sentence: 以布施波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住苦、集、滅、道聖諦；以淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，安住苦、集、滅、道聖諦。
translation: By making the prajñāpāramitā of generosity nondual, nonproductive, and unobtainable, they are directed to the wisdom of all knowing and abide in the noble truths of suffering, arising, ceasing, and the path; and by making the prajñāpāramitā of pure precepts, peaceful forbearance, effort, meditation, and wisdom nondual, nonproductive, and unobtainable, they are directed to the wisdom of all knowing and abide in the noble truths of suffering, arising, ceasing, and the path.

source_sentence: 「慶喜當知！
translation: "Rejoice! You should know!

source_sentence: 以布施波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習四靜慮、四無量、四無色定；以淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多無二為方便、無生為方便、無所得為方便，迴向一切智智，修習四靜慮、四無量、四無色定。
translation: He cultivates the four states of meditation, the four immeasurable concentrations, and the four formless concentrations with the skillful means of the nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition of the perfection of generosity, and he cultivates the four states of meditation, the four immeasurable concentrations, and the four formless concentrations with the skillful means of the nonduality, nonproduction, and nonacquisition of the perfection of pure morality, forbearance, effort, meditation, and prajñā.

source_sentence: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第一百九
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra, Volume 109
